core.php

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 <?php
00002 /* SVN FILE: $Id: core.php 221 2009-03-30 15:05:17Z david@ramaboo.com $ */
00003 /**
00004  * @brief Core config file.
00005  * 
00006  * Contains default values for common Boo constants. You should override \c BOO_DEBUG and \c BOO_PRODUCTION.
00007  * 
00008  * @file
00009  * @license     http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
00010  * @link        http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
00011  * @copyright   2008 David Singer
00012  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
00013  * @version     2.0.1
00014  */
00015 
00016 /**
00017  * @brief Debug mode.
00018  * 
00019  * Set to FALSE in production environment.
00020  * 
00021  * @warning Enabling debug mode can cause sensitive information to be displayed. It should only be used in a private environment.
00022  */
00023 if (!defined('BOO_DEBUG')) { define('BOO_DEBUG', true); }
00024 
00025 /**
00026  * @brief Production mode.
00027  * 
00028  * Set to TRUE in production enviroment.
00029  * This will enable optimizing and other features that are not normaly done.
00030  */
00031 if (!defined('BOO_PRODUCTION')) { define('BOO_PRODUCTION', false); }
00032 
00033 /**
00034  * @brief The Boo version number.
00035  * 
00036  * You will probably not need to change this. Setting the wrong
00037  * version can cause weird things to happen.
00038  */
00039 if (!defined('BOO_VERSION')) { define('BOO_VERSION', '2.0.0'); }
00040 
00041 /**
00042  * @brief Your domain name.
00043  */
00044 if (!defined('BOO_DOMAIN')) { define('BOO_DOMAIN', $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']); }
00045 
00046 /**
00047  * @brief Current scheme used.
00048  * 
00049  * You should not need to change this.
00050  */
00051 if (!defined('BOO_SCHEME')) { define('BOO_SCHEME', ((isset($_SERVER['HTTPS']) && $_SERVER['HTTPS'] == 'on') ? 'https' : 'http')); }
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * @brief Enable SSL support.
00055  */
00056 if (!defined('BOO_SSL')) { define('BOO_SSL', BOO_PRODUCTION); }
00057 
00058 /**
00059  * @brief Secret only known to a single installation.
00060  * This value is used as a salt for several hashing functions.
00061  */
00062 if (!defined('BOO_SECRET')) { define('BOO_SECRET', 'LOTS_OF_RANDOM_CHARACTERS_HERE'); }
00063 
00064 /**
00065  * @brief Allow classes to be overridden.
00066  * 
00067  * For example if TRUE and the class User exists then Boo_User would be replaced with
00068  * type User the Boo_Page object.
00069  * 
00070  * @attention Will not work with all classes. Boo_Dd can not be overriden.
00071  */
00072 if (!defined('BOO_CLASS')) { define('BOO_CLASS', true); }
00073 
00074 /**
00075  * @brief Use browser object.
00076  * 
00077  * Boo contains a usefully browser object which uses the function get_browser().
00078  * Because of the parsing time required this object can slow down an application so it is disabled by default.
00079  * To use it you must have browscap defined in your php.ini file.
00080  * 
00081  * @see http://php.net/manual/en/function.get-browser.php
00082  * @see http://www.php.net/manual/en/misc.configuration.php#ini.browscap
00083  * @see http://browsers.garykeith.com/downloads.asp
00084  */
00085 if (!defined('BOO_BROWSER')) { define('BOO_BROWSER', false && ini_get('browscap')); } // makes sure that \c BOO_BROWSER will only be TRUE if browscap is defined in php.ini
00086 
00087 /**
00088  * @brief Enable WordPress support.
00089  */
00090 if (!defined('BOO_WORDPRESS')) { define('BOO_WORDPRESS', false); }
00091 
00092 /**
00093  * @brief Allows anyone to access scripts located in the scripts folder.
00094  * 
00095  * @warning Setting this to TRUE is a huge security risk and should only
00096  * be done on test machines with limited access.
00097  * 
00098  * Used by the safe_scripts() function.
00099  */
00100 if (!defined('BOO_ALLOW_SCRIPTS')) { define('BOO_ALLOW_SCRIPTS', false); }
00101 
00102 /**
00103  * @brief Allows anyone to access tests located in the tests folder.
00104  * 
00105  * @warning Setting this to TRUE is a huge security risk and should only
00106  * be done on test machines with limited access.
00107  * 
00108  * Used by the safe_tests() function.
00109  */
00110 if (!defined('BOO_ALLOW_TESTS')) { define('BOO_ALLOW_TESTS', false); }
00111 
00112 /**
00113  * @brief Shows the pi.debugger on each page.
00114  * 
00115  * This is useful for testing on Internet Explore or other browsers when Firebug is not available.
00116  * 
00117  * @see http://code.google.com/p/pi-js/
00118  */
00119 if (!defined('BOO_PI_DEBUGGER')) { define('BOO_PI_DEBUGGER', false); }
00120 
00121 /**
00122  * @brief Show Firebug Lite on each page.
00123  * 
00124  * @see http://getfirebug.com/lite.html
00125  */
00126 if (!defined('BOO_FIREBUG_LITE')) { define('BOO_FIREBUG_LITE', false); }
00127 
00128 /**
00129  * @brief Automatically add clearfix class to html elements.
00130  */
00131 if (!defined('BOO_CLEARFIX')) { define('BOO_CLEARFIX', true); }
00132 
00133 /**
00134  * @brief Automatically fix magic quotes.
00135  */
00136 if (!defined('BOO_FIX_MAGIC_QUOTES')) { define('BOO_FIX_MAGIC_QUOTES', true); }
00137 
00138 /**
00139  * @brief Boo log file.
00140  */
00141 if (!defined('BOO_LOG_FILE')) { define('BOO_LOG_FILE', BOO_BASE_DIR . '/log/boo.log'); } // needs write access
